attr.title: Blaze of Storm
attr.desc: Blaze of Storm is an arcade-style vertical scrolling shmup featuring cyber-inspired pixel art, exhilarating fast-scrolling and a variety of sub-weapons.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy all game files into assets folder. You can also use the free demo.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3513070/Blaze_of_Storm/) and copy all game files into `assets` folder. You can also use the free demo.
